de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.transport
Interface TransMessageListener

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentEventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
EmailClient, EmailServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BTPeerDistributeNode, BTTrackerNode, DistributionStrategyImpl, EmailClientImpl, ServerNode
public interface TransMessageListener
extends ComponentEventListener

TransMessageListeners acts as event handlers for incoming TransMsgEvents triggered by the TransLayer. In particular, TransMsgEvents comprises among other things a payload message which in turn comprises data necessary to implement the (virtual) communication between higher layers such as the overlay or application. For instance, the payload field might represent an overlay or application messages. In other words, the transport layers strips off the header information of the transport message and passes all relevant data to the receiving highler layer in terms of TransMsgEvents.

Version:
3.0, 03.12.2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Method Summary
 void messageArrived(TransMsgEvent receivingEvent)
          Upon receiving a transport message, the transport layer strips off the header information of this message and passes all relevant data to a given TransMessageListener in terms of TransMsgEvent.
 

Method Detail

messageArrived

void messageArrived(TransMsgEvent receivingEvent)
Upon receiving a transport message, the transport layer strips off the header information of this message and passes all relevant data to a given TransMessageListener in terms of TransMsgEvent.

Parameters:
receivingEvent - the TransMsgEvent containing all relevant data
